2093.subject: BUS
2093.descrlong: Focuses on the application of marketing principles as they relate to service businesses. Topics include how marketing a service differs from marketing a manufactured product; marketing (planning, pricing, research, segmentation); building customer loyalty; distribution channels; and advertising. Students identify a specific service industry, develop a strategic marketing plan including situational analyses, SWOT analysis, mission statement, position statement, and marketing action plans that include objectives, tactics, and success measures from a legal and ethical perspective.  (Offered in Spring, as interest warrants.)
